metadata.name: Lovina Retreat & Wellnesscenter
metadata.title: Lovina Retreat & Wellnesscenter
metadata.description: Escape to our new yoga retreat in Lovina Bali, where you can connect with yourself and the stunning natural surroundings while practicing traditional yoga practices. With 24 luxurious bungalows surrounded by lush gardens and tranquil water features, you'll feel rejuvenated and relaxed. Enjoy yoga and meditation classes led by experienced instructors, indulge in healing services, savor healthy meals made from locally-sourced ingredients, and take advantage of world-class amenities like a sauna, spa, gym, and infinity pool. The retreat's fruit and flower garden and open space provide a serene setting to unwind and connect with nature. Come and experience the perfect blend of natural beauty, traditional practices, and exceptional hospitality at our new yoga retreat in Bali.
